overview: Dr. Amitava Maulik is responsible for Connectiva’s research and development for products and major technology innovations. He has over 20 years experience in innovation in the areas of data mining, analytics, data warehousing, high performance distributed computing, service oriented architectures, business process orchestration, and geometric modeling. Amitava has published his research in numerous technology journals and books, and has presented at several international conferences and seminars.
